alert.note: Alert for Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 5:09PM MST until March 15 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST FOR WEST CENTRAL YUMA COUNTY... At 509 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Yuma, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Fortuna Foothills and Ligurta. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 14 and 22. AZ Route 195 between mile markers 12 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
